_header: The man that Gods hests held
_description: William of Shoreham, ‘De Decem Preceptis’, — forty-three 8-line stanzas

BLAdd17376.First Lines:
Þe man þat godes hestes haltAnd þat myd gode
                    wylle…
BLAdd17376.Last Lines:
…Þat fleuþ into þe fendes mouþeAnd so
                    seiþe iop þe gode
BLAdd17376.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas. 
             The Poems of William of Shoreham.
Percy Society
         28. London: Richard, 1849: 90-101.
